Riverside Festival Drops Full 2021 Lineup & It's Stacked!

Posted by Brittany Prevost on September 24, 2021

TICKETS

We're but a mere week away until Riverside Festival touches down near Canada's capital. If you've been following us for a while now, you know that this event is one of our absolute favourites! The new location, dynamic atmosphere, impeccable production, and most of all, the lineup, are guaranteed to be the perfect way to close off this year's festival season.

Speaking of the lineup, during the weeks ahead of the 3-day festival, the hardworking organizers have expertly teased a few of their A-list headliners. Recently, eager fans were delighted to receive confirmation of the final round of artists. If you haven't gotten word of it yet, brace yourselves, it's about to ignite your greatest festival desires!

Many of us haven't had the opportunity to attend any form of live music events since the pandemic began. Despite the slow inflow of show announcements, there always seemed to be one thing missing - a good ol' local fest! With that being said, Riverside undeniably came through with their lineup and their undisputed promise of a memorable experience.

From Friday, October 1, 2021, through Sunday, October 3, 2021, catch headlining acts by Subtronics, Bassjackers, Cash Cash and KSHMR. The diverse lineup also includes other big names like Doctor P, Dave Summit, SNBRN, Kat 2 Kat, CHRMNDRS and GESES. Please excuse us while we pick our jaws off the floor...

Tickets are selling fast, Flag fam. Be sure to grab yours before it's too late! It's also important to note the pandemic has forced some new rules and restrictions. Riverside Festival will take place at an alternate site located at the Place des Festivals Zibi. The venue will include dedicated areas for food trucks, bars and parking. Get ready to party from 6:30 p.m. to 10:30 p.m. and be sure to choose your preferred zone (4 sections of 500 attendees)!  

If you're feeling lucky, be sure to enter our giveaway here! For more giveaways and other related details, keep it locked to Riverside's official socials and website. We can't wait to see you all. If you spot us, be sure to flag us down for a family photo. We've missed you and are counting down the days until we're reunited on the dancefloor.

Lastly, we'd like to extend our appreciation to Riverside's team as well as the artists for making this event possible. It's an understatement to say the new way of life is a tricky one to navigate - so, thank you for doing everything in your power to bring live music back into our lives again. Much love! -TFG

Written By Brittany Prevost
·
